quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"discourage"(使气馁)或词根"dis-+course"(过程)错误理解为"使气馁"或"中断进程"
quiz_item.sentence: In his lecture, the professor will **discourse** on the impact of artificial intelligence on modern society.
